scripts.pack: npm run build && zip -r shattered-worlds.zip dist/ lang/ templates/ template.json system.json
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/update-system-version.js && node scripts/update-readme.js
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/update-system-version.js && node scripts/update-readme.js
scripts.bump:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version && node scripts/update-system-version.js && node scripts/update-readme.js
